title: I'll Mature When I'm Dead: Dave Barry's Amazing Tales of Adulthood
description: I'll Mature When I'm Dead is the  New York Times bestseller from "the funniest man in America" ( New York Times ). Let Pulitzer Prize-winning humorist and nationally  un recognized voice of maturity Dave Barry make the journey to adulthood a little easier — and a lot funnier.Not everyone has to be dragged kicking and screaming through adulthood. Dave Barry will help through this process—with his hilarious takes on parenting, changing self-image, the battle of the sexes, technology, health care, celebrityhood, and even vampires!
author: Dave Barry
